per_frame_1=wave_b = max((1 / 3.14) + .5 * sin(time) - (2 / (3 * 3.14)) * cos(2 * time), .3);
per_frame_2=wave_g = .1 * max(5 * mid * sin(mid * time) / (mid_att * mid_att + mid * mid), .1);
per_frame_3=wave_r = max(5 * treb * sin(treb * time) / (treb_att * treb_att + treb * treb), .3);
per_frame_4=decay = .99999995 + .00000005 * abs(sin(50 * time));
per_pixel_1=zoom = if(below(rad, .03), .9, 1 - 2 * (-(3/2) * pow(2.718, sin(bass * bass * time * sin(31.4 * rad) / rad)) + .5 * pow(2.718, sin(treb * treb * time * rad * sin(3.14 * rad) / rad)))/500);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float error     = 0.5;        // maximum random pixel offset
warp_6=`float diffusion = 0.006;      // dither strength
warp_7=`float fadeout   = -0.0006;    // may be minor 1/256 due to the error diffusion dither;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw*1.5 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`float magic = lum(GetPixel(lerp(uv_orig,uv, 4))) - lum(GetBlur2(lerp(uv_orig,uv,-12)));
warp_11=`uv = lerp(uv_orig,uv, magic*12 ) + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*texsize.zw*error;
warp_12=`ret = GetPixel(uv)+(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*diffusion + fadeout;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.zxy;
warp_15=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_sky;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`float2 uvm = frac(uv + time*.0);
comp_5=`
comp_6=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uvm);
comp_7=`float diff = 1-length(ret.xy-GetBlur1(uvm).xy)*3.5;
comp_8=`diff *=1-length(ret.xy-GetBlur2(uvm).xy)*1;
comp_9=`ret.xy *= diff;
comp_10=`float diff2 = 1-length(ret.zy-GetBlur1(uvm).xz)*3.5;
comp_11=`diff2 *=1-length(ret.yz-GetBlur2(uvm).zx)*1;
comp_12=`//ret.z = 0;
comp_13=`ret.zy /= diff2;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`//ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uvm);
comp_16=`
comp_17=`ret-=roam_sin*roam_cos.zxy;
comp_18=`}
